snippet: The conservative commentator has not been on air since October. At first it was because of a book tour; now the network's president says some of what Mr. Buchanan wrote in the book "Suicide of a Superpower" is at issue.
abstract: The conservative commentator has not been on air since October. At first it was because of a book tour; now the network's president says some of what Mr. Buchanan wrote in the book "Suicide of a Superpower" is at issue.
lead_paragraph: PASADENA, Calif. - The days of Patrick J. Buchanan as a commentator on the news channel MSNBC may be over.

headline.main: Patrick Buchanan's Future at MSNBC Is Murky, Network's Chief Says
